scripts.all-tests: npm run run-e2e-tests-service-owner && npm run run-e2e-tests-admin && npm run run-e2e-tests-services-sales && npm run run-e2e-tests-core-sales &&  npm run run-e2e-tests-consultant
scripts.admin-headless: npm run pretest && protractor conf.headless.js --suite adminRole --params.customerUser.username=local_admin
scripts.service-owner-headless: npm run pretest && protractor conf.headless.js --suite serviceOwner --params.customerUser.username=service_owner
scripts.services-sales-headless: npm run pretest && protractor conf.headless.js --suite servicesSales --params.customerUser.username=sales_person
scripts.core-sales-headless: npm run pretest && protractor conf.headless.js --suite coreSales --params.customerUser.username=test_core_sales
scripts.run-e2e-tests-admin: npm run pretest && protractor conf.js --suite adminRole --params.customerUser.username=local_admin
scripts.run-smoke-tests: npm run pretest && protractor conf.js --suite smokeSpecs --params.customerUser.username=sales_person
scripts.run-e2e-tests-service-owner: npm run pretest && protractor conf.js --suite serviceOwner --params.customerUser.username=service_owner
scripts.run-e2e-tests-services-sales: npm run pretest && protractor conf.js --suite servicesSales --params.customerUser.username=sales_person
scripts.run-e2e-tests-core-sales: npm run pretest && protractor conf.js --suite coreSales --params.customerUser.username=test_core_sales
scripts.run-e2e-tests-consultant: npm run pretest && protractor conf.js --suite consultant --params.customerUser.username=test_consultant
